definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc

sentences.english: This process will certainly open up broad prospects for theoretical innovation.
sentences.chinese: 这一过程必将为理论创新开辟广阔前景。

sentences.english: Both has the fertile soil fertile farmland, bumper grain harvest, and has the broad prairie, a hundred flowers in full bloom.
sentences.chinese: 既有沃土良田，五谷丰登，又有广阔草原，百花盛开。

sentences.english: A broader set of primitives, but nonetheless the same fundamental thing holds.
sentences.chinese: 一些广阔的基本类型，但还是同样的基本东西。

sentences.english: Transgenic plant as plant-derived vaccine is prospect in the production of FMD vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 利用转基因植物生产植物源性的口蹄疫疫苗前景广阔。

sentences.english: There are wide application areas for Internet-based teleoperation systems.
sentences.chinese: 基于互联网的遥操作系统具有广阔的应用前景。

sentences.english: This illustrates that this method has good prospect in practical positive-analysis application.
sentences.chinese: 从而说明本方法有实际正演应用的广阔前景。

sentences.english: There exist wide tidal fiats in Qiantang Estuary.
sentences.chinese: 钱塘江河口存在广阔的潮滩地。

sentences.english: This beatitude is as vast as the Bible itself.
sentences.chinese: 这个祝福，如同圣经本身一样广阔。

sentences.english: The river debouches into a wide plain.
sentences.chinese: 这条河进入一片广阔的平原。

sentences.english: High performance fly ash concrete is a kind of green building materials with vast development foreground.
sentences.chinese: 粉煤灰高性能混凝土是具有广阔发展前景的绿色建材。

sentences.english: The tiny little skylark stroked the daisy, and flew away to the wide and blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 小云雀抚摸着小雏菊，带着她飞向广阔的蓝天。

sentences.english: Liquid crystalline epoxy resin is a kind of liquid crystalline thermosets .
sentences.chinese: 液晶环氧树脂是一种具有广阔应用前景的液晶热固体。

sentences.english: Perennial ryegrass carpet lawn soil-less cultivation is of attractive and broad prospect.
sentences.chinese: 多年生黑麦草无土栽培技术具有十分广阔的发展前景。

sentences.english: There is now a broad light box available.
sentences.chinese: 现在有一个可用的灯箱广阔。

sentences.english: This system has a wide development prospection.
sentences.chinese: 本系统具有广阔的发展前景。

sentences.english: It seems to me just the same in the vast human farmyard.
sentences.chinese: 我认为在广阔的人类这个农院里，情况亦然。

definition: to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
depth (from front to rear)/depth (into a territory)/span (of time)/(fig.) depth (of deployment, progress, development etc)
to stretch as far as the eye can see (idiom)
